OHOS::WindowConfig
==================

**Overview**\ 
--------------

**Related Modules:**

`Window <window.md>`__

**Description:**

Sets the attributes for this window.

This structure stores the attributes such as the rectangle, opacity, and
pixel format of this window.

**Since:**

1.0

**Version:**

1.0

**Summary**\ 
-------------

Data Fields
-----------
